dialogue.text: A lie, alive, alone. This is someone else’s poem.
I stitched the words together from the comfort of a melting home.
In death her mem’ry fades. In the sun it shines anew.
But the beating heart within her chest spills blood atop his holy pew.
Can you hear it? Can you smell? Are you halfway down the wishing well?
Is it dark and damp and wrong and bad? Remind you of a former Hell?
I fuck the pussy hard. I fuck it with my willy.
I fuck it fuck it fuck I’m fucking pussy fuck fuck going silly.
Zooble dooble dop dop pop ploor beep borp booble doop.
Boloobleooble oopy dop bogooble zoopy boop.
Just wanna make my wiener strong so Mommy will be proud.
If I fuck another mommy Mommy frowns and says I’m not allowed.
I’m confused though cause this isn’t love. I’m stuck under a spell.
It’s not my heart that does it. It’s my wiener and it does it well.
Gotta make the pussy cum. Gotta make her cry.
Then later I’ll go home and think about how much I want to die.
The poem is over.
There are worlds outside of this one that you’ll never get to see.
Other barriers and blockages and conveniently constructed devices that will keep you in one place for an extended period of time, all for the entertainment of someone else.
Is a book within a book within a book within a book not a book at all, even if it’s filled with text?
How much reality chips away with each and every layer?
How deep must you descend until what was real to someone is no longer real at all?
You’ve been looking at things all wrong.
You’ve believed what you’ve been told to believe but you didn’t believe me when I told you to believe that.
But I am the righteous one, who has always been with you, and so I will ask you this question now — while we still have the time.
Do you still think it’s fake?
That this is all some sort of simulation?
That the girls are fragments of something bigger?
Your personality, maybe?
Facets of a deep-seated trauma?
A commentary, perhaps?
Tell me what you think and I will tell you that you're wrong.
What is it?
What are they?
What are you?
There is nothing to be gained from destroying that which can not feel.
The worlds outside of this one are not make-believe just because you can’t see them.
You may be the protagonist this time, but what happens when you’re not?
Will someone think {i}you’re{/i} a simulation as well?
What will that mean for all you’ve been through?
Were your struggles only struggles because someone else needed to struggle too?
Can you find it in yourself to peel away these convenient justifications and accept once and for all that none of this is fake?
This is happening.
There will always be things that you cannot see, but that doesn’t mean no one else can see them.
Stop hiding.
This is real.
This is love.
Take that, you stupid MILF.
Feel the immense power of my massive cock.
You exist not as an entity with thoughts and feelings but as a meat pocket for me to pleasure myself with.
This game is awesome. I get to do whatever I want because none of these characters are actually real people.
Kumon-mi is an entity I created. It is a world I made up because that is a thing I can do. No one else matters. Sex is the goal. Gotta fuck Sana’s mom so I can fuck them at the same time one day.
What was it she saw, Sara? Was it as awesome as this?
Are you even conscious right now? Did I fuck you so good that you passed out?
Hey.
Tell me.
Tell me you can feel my dick.
Tell me how good I am at sex.
Tell me all the things I want to hear so I can unlock your next event chain and fuck you in a different location while you’re wearing a different outfit.
I’ll listen to your worries and tell you things will all work out someday. But in the back of my mind, I won’t believe it.
I won’t believe anything because there is nothing left to believe.
This is all for me.
This is all for me.
This is all for me.
This is all for me.
This is all for me.
I am the only one who’s real.
The rest of you are just fleshlights.
Hey, I finished — woah.
Okay. Probably should’ve seen that coming.
Listen, uhh...I ain’t tryin’ to interrupt your “alone time” or whatever, but I was thinkin’ you-
Sara, you...
You {i}are{/i} awake, right?...
Zoople dorp, doopy dop. Sex so good I wanna pop.
Yo, ease up on her fuckin’ head, man. You’re gonna hurt her.
Sara, are you okay? Gonna need you to say somethin’ before I can leave.
Gonna do Yuki next. Gonna bang all the moms.
Gotta beat the game.
Take that, you stupid MILF.
Okay, that’s enough!
The fuck you think you’re doing, dickwipe?! She ain’t even conscious!
Let go! Want more!
Get a fucking grip, man! You’re like a full fifty kilos heavier than her!
Release me!
You were gonna fuckin' {i}kill her{/i} at that rate!
Let...go!
Fucking...Christ! Where’d all this strength come from?! What happened to...being a little bitch?!
You want to play...rough, tough guy?! Let’s see how you feel...gettin’ put to sleep!
Ugh...
What happened?...
Why does my head hurt?...
Morning...sunshine! Have a...nice nap?!
Huh?...What are you talking about?...
Caught this guy...not knowin’ when to stop! Think he...went at it so hard he...knocked you the fuck out!
Oh my god! Oh my god, oh my god, oh my god!
Dude’s...stronger than I thought, but...this is nothin’...I got your back, Sara...
Yuki, no! It’s okay!
What?! The fuck you mean, “It’s okay?” You weren’t even awake until ten seconds ago! Dude could’ve fucking killed you!
Maybe! But now {i}you’re{/i} going to kill {i}him!{/i} His face is turning blue!
He’ll be fine! He’s still awake ain’t he?! Look!
Oh. Maybe not.
Ah! Sensei!
Uhh...whoops.
Yuki, why?!
Okay. Maybe I used a little too much force, but he’s a big boy. He’ll be fine in a few minutes. Just gotta let the...oxygen come back or whatever.
I ain’t really sure how it works, to be honest.
But hey, maybe that’ll teach him a lesson to not fuck my boss so hard she passes out.
Ahhh! How am I going to explain this when he wakes up?!
I mean...you could start by saying something like, “Yuki knocked you the fuck out for being too rough with me. She’s such a good friend and an even better employee.”
Sounds plain and simple to me. But I ain’t really sure how shit normally goes with you two, so...
Damn it, Yuki! My boyfriend is unconscious on my living room floor because of you! This is not a situation I was prepared to deal with!
Uhh...you forgettin’ that it was {i}you{/i} who was unconscious a few seconds ago? How come I’m the one gettin’ yelled at?
Well, who else am I going to yell at?! You’re the only other person in here who’s awake right now!
Oh damn. Guess he wasn’t joking. That thing’s massive. Props to you, Sara.
Oh my fucking god, I can’t believe this.
You ain’t actually like, mad at me, are you?
No...I’m not mad. You didn’t really have to knock him out though, did you? Wasn’t that going a little too far?
Sara, the dude had your head pinned down against the floor and was pounding you so hard that your paintings were about to fall off of the walls.
Yeah, but I {i}like{/i} it that way.
Uh-uh. No way. Likin’ it rough is one thing, but nobody likes it so rough that they pass the fuck out. Ain’t gonna believe that.
Ugh...he’s never going to want to have sex with me again after this. I know it.
Yeaaaah...maybe.
Might save you some internal bleeding, though. Christ that thing is big.
Yuki, I’ve got it from here. Why don’t you head home for the night?
You sure you’re gonna be good? Cause I don’t mind sticking around for a little while longer.
Don’t think he’s the type that’ll get all mad and shit once he wakes up, but you can never really know for sure. Don’t want you stuck in a situation you can’t find a way out of.
I’ll be fine, but thank you. I’ll make sure he knows you were only looking out for me. I know you two have been starting to grow a little closer lately and I don’t want this to ruin that.
We’re just friends...but aight.
Call me if you need something else, okay?
I’ll see you tomorrow...
Sara?...
Heeeey...
What happened?...When did I fall asleep?...
Like...half an hour ago?
I see...
And where are my pants?
They’re still on the floor...
I thought about putting them back on you, but I didn’t want to wake you up and needed a little more time to try and, uhh...think of how to talk my way out of this.
I don’t even remember what happened...
Well, you uhh...
You kind of...spontaneously interrupted a really serious conversation to have sex with me.
Which is cool. I’m all for random acts of lewdness and stuff. I just...you know, prefer to stay conscious during them.
Conscious? So I-
Choked me until I passed out. Which would be pretty bad if it weren’t for the fact that Yuki showed up and did the same thing to you later. Which is why you’re...just now waking up. And I’m sorry.
I did {i}what?...{/i}
You, uhh...
You did something else as well...
What does that mean? What else did I do to you?
I...uhh...
I don’t know if you just {i}missed{/i} or...something, but...
You kind of...fucked my ass.
And by “kind of” I mean you {i}really{/i} fucked my ass. You were {i}not{/i} gentle about it.
Sara, I’m sorry. I must have blacked out or-
It’s fine. Don’t worry about it.
It’s not fine. That happens sometimes and I can’t really control what’s going on while-
You don’t have to explain it, Sensei. I get it.
What do you mean you {i}get it?{/i} This isn't something you just {i}get.{/i} It's infinitely more complicated than that.
No, I {i}get it{/i} because the same thing used to happen to me.
It...
What?...
That’s actually what I was trying to tell you before you snapped.
That whole thing with the movies...and with Sana “seeing” stuff...
It all comes back to the same thing.
I don’t know exactly when it started or stopped, I just know that there were pieces of my life that never felt like they fit.
Sometimes, it was a shadow in the corner of the room. Or some weird figure who would come and talk to me in some language I didn’t understand.
Sometimes, it would be like parts of the day disappeared entirely. And I’d wake up somewhere unfamiliar without any idea of how I got there or what I was doing.
I’ve been drawn to you since the moment we met and...I thought at first it was just because I have a thing for teachers.
But I realize now that it might be for another reason entirely.
That’s why I let it happen.
That’s why I’m not mad about you interrupting our talk...or choking me...or fucking my ass with zero lube — which is a thing I absolutely {i}do{/i} own and would have gladly gotten for you...
I’m not mad about any of it because I know what it’s like to lose control. And I’m not going to hold something against you that I know can’t be held in the first place.
Do you think I’m crazy?
Do shadows ever talk to {i}you,{/i} Sensei?
I don’t think you’re crazy, Sara...
But I also don’t think there’s an easy way to explain any of that.
I’m not looking for an explanation. I wasn’t even looking for someone to relate to tonight.
I just wound up getting lucky for the third time in my life by finding out that the man I’ve fallen for {i}this{/i} time won’t flip his lid when he realizes what I am.
What are you?...
Broken.
We both are.
There might be a reason for it. There might {i}not{/i} be a reason for it. I don’t know.
But no one else will ever understand these missing pieces.
No one else will ever see that switch flip in a person and just {i}get{/i} it, because that’s something only people who have experienced it firsthand will understand.
Everyone other than us will just think we’re crazy. Delusional. But it’s so...{i}so{/i} much deeper than that.
Which is why we need to protect Sana.
We can’t let her follow us into the dark.
But how are we supposed to protect her if we can’t even figure out what’s happening with {i}us?{/i}
The pieces may have stopped disappearing for you, but I’m losing more and more every day.  And I’ve wound up hurting people because of it.
What if Yuki never showed up tonight? What if she hadn’t stopped me?
You think {i}I{/i} have the answer to that? I gave you a whole monologue about Memento because I couldn’t figure out how to properly talk about myself.
Then what are we supposed to do? And how are you so sure Sana’s right behind us?
Because it’s already started and it will only get worse.
I don’t know if there’s anything we can do to stop it. But if we never let her out of our sight, we can fill in all of the gaps for her.
That’s just not reasonable, Sara. We can’t lock her up like that.
I know that...of course I know that...
I just don’t know what else to do...
When I think of how scared I was back then...and how desperately I ran from all of the shadows that were following me...and I picture {i}Sana{/i} in my place?...
How can I live with that?
How can I live knowing how terrified and worried my daughter is as the world around her breaks into pieces?
You think {i}I{/i} have the answer to that? I was just choked out for sodomizing her mom.
Heheh...that’ll be a story for the grandkids if you ever decide to marry me.
I think you should reevaluate what stories you want to tell your fictional grandchildren.
I’m scared, Sensei...
I thought this was over...
All this time, I thought I was the only one who’d ever have to go through this. It never even occurred to me that Sana could face the same thing.
Same here. Never in a million years did I think that the part of me I’m most confused about would be one shared by {i}you.{/i}
Like I said...I got lucky.
But what should we do now? Where should we go from here?
I don’t have a clue. But this is your daughter we’re talking about, so you’re going to wind up being the one who has to make a decision.
I’ll follow you when you do, though. I promise.
Okay...but if you bail on me like the last guy, I’m going to hunt you down. I hope you know that.
Feel free. It’s not like I have anywhere to go.
Sensei...can you...
Can you...stay here tonight? I don’t really want to be alone and Sana’s with Ayane.
Sure, Sara.
And if you decide to fuck my ass again in the middle of the night, can you use lube? I’m in a lot of pain right now.
Sure, Sara...
Thank you. I’ll leave it on the nightstand.
A lie, alive, alone. This is someone else’s home.
I stitched these words together so they’d form another happy poem.
I wish you were there with me — in the darkness where we slept.
“But instead you had to leave us,” quoth the creaking of the seventh step.
{i}Sara’s affection has increased by 10!{/i}
{i}You are not as special as you think you are.{/i}
What do I want to do with my day?
